name: Berserk dungeon
description:
This is a small roguelike game in which the less HP you have, the more damage you deal.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - move.
  • Left click - shoot.
  • Right click - dash.
  • R - reload.

This game was made for the third Blackthornprod Game Jam.

Theme - Less is More!
